channel.title: Help with exp change in elite pk
channel.description: How would i change the experiance rate from the range/atk/str/defense places. i mean, they give like 100xp each time and im confused..

item.title: Help with exp change in elite pk
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Search for Case IdNr:

like for zamorak statue
2874 is the object number

case 2874: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer <= 0) { sendMessage("Zamorak Hears You And Gives You Strenght Xp!"); actionTimer = 45; setAnimation(791); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((8*playerLevel[3]), 3); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

In this line change the exp’s
The fat ones give exp

	addSkillXP(([b]20[/b]*playerLevel[2]), 2);
	addSkillXP(([b]8[/b]*playerLevel[3]), 3);

Read full topic
item.source: Help with exp change in elite pk
